metadata.synopsis: Lae'zel died in the tutorial. Her body was found on the beach (remember that bodies can be moved though). Player revived her.The flag ORI_LaezelRecruitment_State_CrashVersionInitiated is set upon loading WLD_Main_A, when this version of the recruitment is activated.

64.speaker: Lae'zel
64.text: Our paths cross again, istik. I might call it fate, if I believed in it.

80.speaker: Lae'zel
80.text: Has the error of your ways become clear?

92.speaker: Player
92.text: I would like you to join me.

33.speaker: Player
33.text: Wait at my camp. We can speak there.

105.speaker: Lae'zel
105.text: I live. Vlaakith blesses me once more!

110.speaker: Narrator
110.text: *Your skull briefly aches, and you are her. You feel the woman's momentary relief over her revival - and her loathing of the parasite lodged in her brain.*

6.speaker: Narrator
6.text: *You also feel answers. She knows more about your condition.*
6.context: NodeContext: Speaking to the player regarding Lae'zel. Discreetly urging caution

58.speaker: Lae'zel
58.text: You were on the gh'ath. The nautiloid. You carry a tadpole.
58.context: NodeContext: Speaking to the player regarding Lae'zel. Discreetly urging caution

70.speaker: Lae'zel
70.text: Neither the ghaik nor the crash have broken your spirit. Yes - you may still be of considerable use.
70.context: NodeContext: Speaking to the player regarding Lae'zel. Discreetly urging caution

102.speaker: Lae'zel
102.text: The longer the parasite lives, the more of us it consumes.
102.context: NodeContext: Speaking to the player regarding Lae'zel. Discreetly urging caution

35.speaker: Lae'zel
35.text: Together, we must find a crèche: my people possess the cure for this infection.
35.context: NodeContext: Speaking to the player regarding Lae'zel. Discreetly urging caution

38.speaker: Player
38.text: Careful - she obviously sees your kindness as weakness. Don't let her take advantage.
38.context: NodeContext: Speaking to the player regarding Lae'zel. Discreetly urging caution

94.speaker: Shadowheart
94.text: Careful - she obviously sees your kindness as weakness. Don't let her take advantage.
94.context: NodeContext: Speaking to the player regarding Lae'zel. Discreetly urging caution

54.speaker: Shadowheart
54.text: Lies. Just get rid of her.
54.context: NodeContext: Tersely murmured advice. You're not going to trust her, are you?

24.speaker: Player
24.text: Come - our search begins. We've no time to waste.

28.speaker: Lae'zel
28.text: Come - our search begins. We've no time to waste.

56.speaker: Player
56.text: And what exactly is a crèche...?

108.speaker: Lae'zel
108.text: It is many things. A hatchery, a training grounds, a shelter.

57.speaker: Lae'zel
57.text: Githyanki protocol is clear: when infected with a ghaik tadpole, we must report to a ghustil for purification.

27.speaker: Player
27.text: I just resurrected you. May I suggest a hearty 'thank you'?

103.speaker: Lae'zel
103.text: You may as well suggest a wyvern bow to worms.

59.speaker: Lae'zel
59.text: The cure I offer will suffice as thanks.

83.speaker: Player
83.text: Locating a crèche would be wise indeed. Where might we find one?

87.speaker: Lae'zel
87.text: I do not yet know - we will seek it together. Protocol is clear:

5.speaker: Lae'zel
5.text: When infected with a ghaik tadpole, we must report to a ghustil for purification.

98.speaker: Player
98.text: I don't know this protocol. What does purification entail?

52.speaker: Lae'zel
52.text: The crèche holds the zaith'isk. It will cleanse us of the parasite.

101.speaker: Lae'zel
101.text: By covenant, I can say no more.

113.speaker: Player
113.text: I honour our alliance, kin. Let us seek a crèche.

40.speaker: Player
40.text: We'll go our separate ways, I think.

7.speaker: Player
7.text: Join me, then. But I'll be watching you closely.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: All right, we journey together. Let's find this crèche.

73.speaker: Player
73.text: I'm dreadfully curious: might one neutralise the tadpole while keeping its powers?
73.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sh addresses the player. She glances at Lae'zel on 'this one'InternalNodeContext: This node if SH is available and has approval of the player that's greater than 0

85.speaker: Lae'zel
85.text: I know my teachings. There are no half measures.
85.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sh addresses the player. She glances at Lae'zel on 'this one'InternalNodeContext: This node if SH is available and has approval of the player that's greater than 0

12.speaker: Lae'zel
12.text: If you wish to be rid of the tadpole, you must either be purified - or beheaded.
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sh addresses the player. She glances at Lae'zel on 'this one'InternalNodeContext: This node if SH is available and has approval of the player that's greater than 0

67.speaker: Player
67.text: We seem like a poor match, frankly. Let's go our separate ways.
67.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sh addresses the player. She glances at Lae'zel on 'this one'InternalNodeContext: This node if SH is available and has approval of the player that's greater than 0

3.speaker: Player
3.text: Consider your hunger. Fresh blood flows beneath that skin...
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sh addresses the player. She glances at Lae'zel on 'this one'InternalNodeContext: This node if SH is available and has approval of the player that's greater than 0

79.speaker: Lae'zel
79.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sh addresses the player. She glances at Lae'zel on 'this one'InternalNodeContext: This node if SH is available and has approval of the player that's greater than 0

11.speaker: Player
11.text: Purificiation it is, then. You and I better find this crèche.
11.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sh addresses the player. She glances at Lae'zel on 'this one'InternalNodeContext: This node if SH is available and has approval of the player that's greater than 0

36.speaker: Player
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sh addresses the player. She glances at Lae'zel on 'this one'InternalNodeContext: This node if SH is available and has approval of the player that's greater than 0

90.speaker: Lae'zel
90.text: You would sacrifice yourself to ghaik?
90.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sh addresses the player. She glances at Lae'zel on 'this one'InternalNodeContext: This node if SH is available and has approval of the player that's greater than 0

15.speaker: Lae'zel
15.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sh addresses the player. She glances at Lae'zel on 'this one'InternalNodeContext: This node if SH is available and has approval of the player that's greater than 0

14.speaker: Player
14.text: Fine - we can try working together.
14.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sh addresses the player. She glances at Lae'zel on 'this one'InternalNodeContext: This node if SH is available and has approval of the player that's greater than 0

114.speaker: Lae'zel
114.text: You do not have the authority. Defer to your leader.
114.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sh addresses the player. She glances at Lae'zel on 'this one'InternalNodeContext: This node if SH is available and has approval of the player that's greater than 0

77.speaker: Lae'zel
77.text: You are full up. Dismiss your weakest warrior.
77.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sh addresses the player. She glances at Lae'zel on 'this one'InternalNodeContext: This node if SH is available and has approval of the player that's greater than 0

116.speaker: Lae'zel
116.text: You are full up. Dismiss your weakest warrior.
116.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sh addresses the player. She glances at Lae'zel on 'this one'InternalNodeContext: This node if SH is available and has approval of the player that's greater than 0

84.speaker: Player
84.text: Wait at my camp. We can speak there.

53.speaker: Lae'zel
53.text: Very well. But heed my words.

44.speaker: Lae'zel
44.text: A crèche is near - we must seek signs of it. Only there can we be purified.

78.speaker: Lae'zel
78.text: Search these corpses for a map, and beware the skies. We are watched.

82.speaker: Lae'zel
82.text: I will await word at your camp.

50.speaker: Lae'zel
50.text: I will await word at your camp. And beware the skies. We are watched.

1.speaker: Lae'zel
1.text: We must scout the roads and scan the skies for children of Gith. They will lead us to a crèche. There, we will be purified.

107.speaker: Lae'zel
107.text: I will be at your camp. Do not keep me waiting.

55.speaker: Lae'zel
55.text: You have made an ally from Crèche K'liir - few know such fortune. Call me Lae'zel.
55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sh addresses the player. She glances at Lae'zel on 'this one'InternalNodeContext: This node if SH is available and has approval of the player that's greater than 0

117.speaker: Player
117.text: I'll trust your judgement - but I won't trust her. Not until I've gotten the measure of her.
117.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sh addresses the player. She glances at Lae'zel on 'this one'InternalNodeContext: This node if SH is available and has approval of the player that's greater than 0

37.speaker: Shadowheart
37.text: I'll trust your judgement - but I won't trust her. Not until I've gotten the measure of her.
37.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sh addresses the player. She glances at Lae'zel on 'this one'InternalNodeContext: This node if SH is available and has approval of the player that's greater than 0

9.speaker: Shadowheart
9.text: Fool. No point in showing a mad dog kindness - it'll still bite you in the end.
9.context: InternalNodeContext: Set from talking to Zorru or to the dead tiefling at the 3 ogres

61.speaker: Lae'zel
61.text: You've a sharp tongue, elf. Would that your mind proved its equal.
61.context: InternalNodeContext: Set from talking to Zorru or to the dead tiefling at the 3 ogres

8.speaker: Shadowheart
8.text: Half-elf. I suppose the finer details are lost on a creature like you.
8.context: InternalNodeContext: Set from talking to Zorru or to the dead tiefling at the 3 ogres

65.speaker: Player
65.text: Enough. A crèche is near - we must seek signs of it. Search these corpses for a map.
65.context: InternalNodeContext: Set from talking to Zorru or to the dead tiefling at the 3 ogres

99.speaker: Lae'zel
99.text: Enough. A crèche is near - we must seek signs of it. Search these corpses for a map.
99.context: InternalNodeContext: Set from talking to Zorru or to the dead tiefling at the 3 ogres

43.speaker: Lae'zel
43.text: Enough. A crèche is near - we must seek signs of it. Forward, through the pass.
43.context: InternalNodeContext: Set from talking to Zorru or to the dead tiefling at the 3 ogres

74.speaker: Lae'zel
74.text: And beware the skies. We are watched.

95.speaker: Lae'zel
95.text: A crèche is near - we must seek signs of it. Search these corpses for a map.
95.context: InternalNodeContext: Set from talking to Zorru or to the dead tiefling at the 3 ogres

51.speaker: Lae'zel
51.text: A crèche is near - we must seek signs of it. Forward, through the pass.
51.context: InternalNodeContext: Set from talking to Zorru or to the dead tiefling at the 3 ogres

112.speaker: Lae'zel
112.text: We scout the roads and scan the skies for children of Gith. They will lead us to a crèche.
112.context: InternalNodeContext: Set from talking to Zorru or to the dead tiefling at the 3 ogres

18.speaker: Lae'zel
18.context: InternalNodeContext: Set from talking to Zorru or to the dead tiefling at the 3 ogres

93.speaker: Player
93.text: I'm told of githyanki near a mountain pass, off the Risen Road.
93.context: InternalNodeContext: Set from talking to Zorru or to the dead tiefling at the 3 ogres

0.speaker: Player
0.text: I have seen a red dragon, flying above the Risen Road.

4.speaker: Lae'zel
4.text: A red dragon? Then githyanki are near! Onward - purification awaits us.

89.speaker: Player
89.text: I have seen githyanki, near the mountain pass. One rode a red dragon.

32.speaker: Lae'zel
32.text: Then we mustn't delay. Onward - purification awaits us.

41.speaker: Player
41.text: Githyanki confronted me on the Risen Road, but I convinced them to let me live.

21.speaker: Lae'zel
21.text: You angered a kith'rak? You are lucky your heart still beats.

88.speaker: Lae'zel
88.text: You angered githyanki? You are lucky your heart still beats.

91.speaker: Player
91.text: Githyanki attacked me on the Risen Road. They sought a weapon of some sort.

45.speaker: Lae'zel
45.text: A weapon? Is this what the kith'raki sought from the nautiloid?

72.speaker: Lae'zel
72.text: Bah. A cure must be our chief concern. Onward - purification awaits us.

39.speaker: Player
39.text: Githyanki attacked me on the Risen Road. They did not survive.

49.speaker: Lae'zel
49.text: They attacked their own kin? This is most extraordinary.

97.speaker: Lae'zel
97.text: You survived an encounter with githyanki? Extraordinary. They must have suffered prior injury...

100.speaker: Player
100.text: I have discovered a githyanki slate. Perhaps you can read it.

42.speaker: Lae'zel
42.text: A slate? A map to the nearest crèche, perhaps.

81.speaker: Lae'zel
81.text: Yes - I must read it at once. Purification may be at hand!

46.speaker: Player
46.text: I have located the crèche. It lies just beyond the mountain pass.

66.speaker: Lae'zel
66.text: Then we know our destination. Onward.

60.speaker: Player
60.text: Scowl all you like - you have my answer.

10.speaker: Player
10.context: NodeContext: SHKA-keth! Just like it is spelled.

47.speaker: Lae'zel
47.context: NodeContext: SHKA-keth! Just like it is spelled.

106.speaker: Lae'zel
106.text: We must set out for a crèche - purification awaits.
